channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Today’s Democrat Party, Political Violence Is Mainstream
item.description: Political violence is no longer confined to the margins of American life. The so-called “fringe” left is not fringe at all.

item.title: Trump’s Pivot on Ukraine Can Bring Peace
item.description: By speaking the truth clearly, Trump has sent a clarion call to both our allies and our adversaries.

item.title: Oklahoma state Superintendent Ryan Walters leaving for new job where he will wage war against teachers unions
item.description: Oklahoma state Superintendent Ryan Walters is leaving that post to serve as CEO of the Teacher Freedom Alliance and plans "to destroy the teachers uni...

item.title: Dems, Unelected Bureaucrats Obstruct Implementation Of Trump Elections Order
item.description: What’s the holdup? Bureaucratic dysfunction? Always. But the usual muck of politics in the TDS era is at work.

item.title: Trump says he will not let Israel annex West Bank
item.description: President Trump said he would not allow Israel to annex the occupied West Bank, saying "there's been enough."

item.title: Here’s What Charlie Kirk Has In Common With Socrates
item.description: History rarely affords such exact parallels. The spirit, the calling, and the mission of Socrates was almost exactly that of Charlie Kirk.

item.title: The Indictment Against Comey Should Be Dismissed
item.description: It’s an incomprehensible case.

item.title: U.K. says it will introduce digital ID cards, reviving a contentious idea

item.title: After Harming The Country With Russiagate, Comey’s Indictment Is Well Deserved
item.description: Former FBI Director James Comey's role in helping form and advance the Russia collusion hoax cannot be overstated.

item.title: Lawmakers push Congress to condemn 'escalation of attacks' on ICE officers after Dallas shooting
item.description: Republicans in Congress introduced a resolution condemning violent attacks on ICE after a deadly shooting at a Dallas facility.

item.description: Over half of Gen Zers and nearly 60% of millennials are depending on their inheritance to achieve financial security. Just 22% of baby boomers expect ...

item.title: Trump says 'I think we have a deal' on Gaza war
item.description: President Donald Trump said Friday that "I think we have a deal" on ending the Israel-Hamas war, adding, "It's going to be peace."

item.title: Thune says a shutdown can still be avoided if Democrats 'dial back' their demands

item.title: Trump announces tariffs on drugs, trucks and cabinets
item.description: President Trump late Thursday announced a smorgasbord of new tariffs on foreign pharmaceuticals, heavy trucks and kitchen and bathroom decor.

item.title: Trump cheers Comey indictment, says former FBI director must 'pay a big price'
item.description: President Trump weighed in on the indictment of former FBI Director James B. Comey, saying he was a "destroyer of lives" who must "pay a big price."

item.title: Democrats, Who Weaponized Justice Against Trump, Decry Comey Indictment As Retribution
item.description: The Democrat Party, the party for today’s political assassin, stopped at literally nothing to take out Trump.

item.title: Starbucks continues to cut corporate jobs in turnaround bid: ‘Many are cost centers, not revenue producers,’ says expert
item.description: The company will eliminate about 900 more non-retail partner roles and many open positions.

item.title: Comey denies charges, declares 'I am not afraid'
item.description: Former FBI Director James Comey has declared himself "not afraid" of President Trump's Justice Department after he was indicted on federal charges.
